Work Experience.Position: SSK Data Scientist - Advanced Analytics & AI
Work Experience.Description: Developed machine learning and ETL pipelines, implemented custom algorithms, and created a recommendation algorithm for internal API-call mappings that significantly improved team workflows; gained a deep understanding of the full software development lifecycle, strengthened skills in Git and OOP, and fostered a strong interest in backend development.

Work Experience.Position: SSK Data Analyst - Operational Risk Management
Work Experience.Description: Implemented tree-based models for operational risk analysis, applied clustering, and dimensionality reduction for improved decision-making. Set up a SQL database for efficient data delivery and storage, automated Power BI reporting in Databricks, conducted exploratory data analysis, optimized Power BI reports, and updated legacy R code to Python.

Led a university project in collaboration with APA, focusing on data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, and version control using Git/GitHub. Developed and fine-tuned classification models with Scikit-learn and deep learning models (LSTM, CNN) using TensorFlow. Worked with Large Language Models, fine-tuning RoBERTa with Hugging Face and PyTorch. Created a GUI with HTML/CSS/JS and deployed the model using FastAPI.

Education.Institution: Vienna University of Business and Economics
Education.Thesis: From Trees to Neural Networks: A Comparative Analysis of Machine Learning Models on Performance, Interpretability, Computational Cost and Ease of Deployment.
